welcome 2 a fun game of mafia yall. you know the general rules dont fuck w. me on this ill freaking mod kill u so fast.

modified bam ruleset:
(stolen/modified from Xyl)
1.) Votes must be bolded and at the start of a line. If I don’t see it, I wont count it.
2.) Unvoting is nice, but not necessary.
3.) Once a majority is reached, that person is lynched.
4.) If there is no majority at deadline, there will be no lynch for that day.
5.) game days have a deadline of 7 days.
6.) nights will be 24 hours maximum. Any night actions not submitted will simply not happen, although night actions may be submitted ahead of time.
7.) Do not talk about this game outside the thread unless your role allows you to.
8.) When you die, you are dead. Stay that way.
9.) Do not edit posts. Do not use invisible text. Do not use small text.
10.) Do not quote any communication from the mod (that includes PMs) in the game thread.
11.) If you are going to be gone for an extended period of time, please let me know. See rule 12.
12) prods will be issued after 36 hours of inactivity. upon the 3rd prod your slot will be force replaced. failure to respond to a prod within 24 hours will result in being force replaced
13.) If you notice mistakes aside from the vote count, PM me. Bold notification about vote count issues in the thread.
14.) Play to win.
15.) Play with the spirit of the game in mind.
15.a.) This means ASK before you do something you think I might question. Questions are good. Modkills are bad. See rule 12.
16.) Have fun. Remember that everyone playing are actually real people and treat them as such.
17.) pink is my color. dont use it.


the following are possible roles that players in this game may have. if the role is not listed here, its not in the game.
Spoiler: possible roles
youre a vnilla townie. congrats.
you win when all threats to the town are dead.

you are a #-shot vigilante. once per night up to # times you may submit the name of a player to me to kill.
you win when all threats 2 the town are dead.

you are a mason. your mason partner is <name> and you know that they share your win condition. you have a quicktopic here <link>. you may discuss with your partner in this quicktopic whenever you like.
you win when all threats 2 the town are dead.

you are a cop. once per night you may submit the name of a player to me and i will return either a guilty or innocent result to you.
you win when all threats 2 the town are dead.

you are a watcher. once per night you may submit the name of a player to me and i will tell you the name of any players who visited him that night.
you win when all threats to the town are dead.

you are an innocent child. at any time in the game you may pm me and ask me to confirm your innocence in the thread.
you win when all threats 2 the town are dead.


you are a mafia goon. your partners are <name> and <name>. you may discuss with your partners in this quicktopic <link> whenever you like. you share a factional kill with your partners: once per night one of you or your partners may submit the name of a player to me that you wish to kill.
you win when you and your partners comprise the majority of the game or nothing can stop the same.

you are a mafia godfather. any investigation to your alignment will return the result of innocent. your partners are <name> and <name>. you may discuss with your partners in this quicktopic <link> whenever you like. you share a factional kill with your partners: once per night one of you or your partners may submit the name of a player to me that you wish to kill.
you win when you and your partners comprise the majority of the game or nothing can stop the same.

you are a mafia roleblocker. once per night you may submit the name of a player you wish to roleblock. any active abilities that player uses that night will be prevented. your partners are <name> and <name>. you may discuss with your partners in this quicktopic <link> whenever you like. you share a factional kill with your partners: once per night one of you or your partners may submit the name of a player to me that you wish to kill. you may use this kill in conjuction with your roleblock.
you win when you and your partners comprise the majority of the game or nothing can stop the same.

you are a mafia rolecop. once per night you may submit the name of a player to me and i will inform you of their role name. your partners are <name> and <name>. you may discuss with your partners in this quicktopic <link> whenever you like. you share a factional kill with your partners: once per night one of you or your partners may submit the name of a player to me that you wish to kill. you may perform this kill in conjuction with your role detection.
you win when you and your partners comprise the majority of the game or nothing can stop the same.

Ok so I agree that SC’s insistence on distancing from me/kondi is suspicious. On the other hand, I do not think he is scum.

Possible reasons for his actions as I can see it:

(1) there has been a lot of talk about buddying and why that is scummy. He may be worried about being accused of buddying like kondi was on me and thus wants to distance himself to show he isn’t buddying hard.

I would like to note that I do not agree with the idea of buddying being inherently scummy. I at least do not agree with it when the way we define budying is really just “agreeing.” There are a lot of other reasons people might buddy. They might be familiar with eachother from other games, they may have a strong townread on the person and therefore trust them, etc. A voting bloc, for example, is a codified version of town buddying.

(2) he feels I am likely to be lynched but he doesn’t want to be lynched so he doesn’t want our names to be associated.

(3) he is town, and is worried I might flip scum if I am lynched

If he is scum, he knows my alignment, and from my perspective would not want to distance himself from me. He would likely want to be buddying up with me more in that case so that if he gets lynched and flips scum, I would be under a lot of heat the next day, and if I get lynched and flip town, he would not be under so much scrutiny (besides the possible WIFOM arguments).

I realize this logic doesn’t work for anyone besides myself since it is contingent on you knowing my alignment. But I see no way for him to be scum based on this.
